statements: SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE loyalty_points > 100;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE loyalty_program_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT customer_name, loyalty_points FROM customers WHERE loyalty_points < 50 ORDER BY loyalty_points ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE loyalty_points > 100 ORDER BY customer_name ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE loyalty_program_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE '%John%' OR customer_email LIKE '%gmail.com%'
SELECT customer_name, SUM(loyalty_points) AS total_points FROM customers GROUP BY customer_name HAVING total_points > 500 ORDER BY total_points DESC
SELECT customer_name, AVG(loyalty_points) AS avg_points FROM customers WHERE loyalty_points > 0 GROUP BY customer_name HAVING avg_points < 50
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%' ORDER BY first_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE first_name = 'John' ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM customers JOIN loyalty_programs ON customers.customer_id = loyalty_programs.program_id WHERE discount_rate > 0.1;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE first_name LIKE 'A%' OR last_name LIKE 'B%';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE loyalty_points > 100;
SELECT customer_name, loyalty_points FROM customers WHERE loyalty_points BETWEEN 50 AND 200;
SELECT customer_id, program_id, join_date FROM customer_loyalty WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT program_name, program_description FROM loyalty_programs ORDER BY program_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, loyalty_points FROM customers WHERE loyalty_points > 100;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT customer_name, program_name, join_date FROM customers JOIN customer_loyalty ON customers.customer_id = customer_loyalty.customer_id;
SELECT program_name, program_description FROM loyalty_programs;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE loyalty_points >= 100;
SELECT program_name, program_discount FROM loyalty_programs ORDER BY program_discount DESC;
SELECT customer_id, total_amount FROM customer_transactions WHERE total_amount > 100 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT campaign_name, campaign_description, start_date, end_date FROM targeted_campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_programs ORDER BY program_discount DESC;
SELECT customer_id, loyalty_points FROM customers WHERE loyalty_points > 1000;
SELECT * FROM customer_transactions WHERE total_amount > 500 AND transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM targeted_campaigns WHERE start_date < '2022-09-01';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM customers WHERE loyalty_id = 1;
SELECT program_name, program_discount FROM loyalty_programs WHERE expiry_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT offer_id, discount_amount, start_date FROM offers ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, customer_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE loyalty_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, email FROM customers WHERE last_name = 'Smith';
SELECT * FROM offers WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT c.first_name, l.program_name FROM customers c JOIN loyalty_programs l ON c.loyalty_id = l.loyalty_id;
SELECT t.amount, t.transaction_date, c.first_name FROM transactions t JOIN customers c ON t.customer_id = c.customer_id WHERE t.amount > 100;
